sqlMap.select:
SELECT a.id as articleId, a.title as articleTitle, a.creationdate as articleDate, a.content as articleContent, a.category as articleCategoryId, u.username as userName, u.company as companyName, u.firstname as firstName, u.lastname as lastName
FROM article a left join users u on a.author = u.username WHERE a.id = #value#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into article(title, abstract, content, category, author) values (#title#, #abstract#, #content#, #categoryId#, #author#)
SELECT last_value FROM article_id_seq
insert into category(name, description, parent, company) values (#name#, #description#, #parent#, #company#)
sqlMap.select: select #value# as articleid, ai.image as imageid, i.name as imagename, i.type as imagetype from article_image ai left join image i on ai.image = i.id where ai.article=#value#
sqlMap.update: update article set title=#title#, abstract=#abstract#, content=#content#, author=#userName#, creationDate=now() where id=#id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT a.id as articleThumbnailId, a.title as articleThumbnailTitle, a.author as articleThumbnailAuthorName, a.creationdate as articleThumbnailDate FROM article a left join category cat on a.category = cat.id where cat.company = #companyName# order by a.creationdate desc limit #number#;
